subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Checks that specified types are not declared to be thrown. Declaring that a method throws java.lang.Error or java.lang.RuntimeException is almost never acceptable.

tr.td: Allow to ignore checking overridden methods (marked with Override or java.lang.Override annotation).
Specify names of methods to ignore.
Specify throw class names to reject.

td.code: Error, RuntimeException, Throwable, java.lang.Error, java.lang.RuntimeException, java.lang.Throwable
